name: Dad Simulator Family Game
description:
Looks like mommy has taken a day off from her duties and the maid is not on duty either which makes virtual daddy as the kitchen helper and the care taker of the house.Lets see if the daddy has the potential to clean the messy house and make it all tidy in the cleaning games.

The house is full of mess and the flooring needs to be done as the kids have created a lot of mess and threw their stinky socks and clothes everywhere. Its time to take a promotion from the dad to super daddy and let your wife rest for some time in the role playing game.

The kitchen is flooding with dirty dishes and your home alone with all the mess, the fridge has some dirt on it too. Clean it all and let the house shine for your married life in the cleaning games. Wash the dish and cook delicious food in the virtual games for the kids and be the kitchen helper for your family in the cleaning game.

The daddy’s little girl and boy are here to help you with the chores. Fold the washed clothes and laundry. The daddy irons the clothes and after ironing, he take care of the smiley baby girl and boys.

Wash your car and greet your neighbours too in the neighbors game full of fun, activity and adventure. You will enjoy this tour of cleaning your messy home and leaving for work when its all incredible tidy because you have made a commitment now so that the kids will say i love my dad.

Its the daddys day home alone and its your turn to be the kitchen helper in the messy house.

Help the kids find their stuff they lost. Cook yummy food for the terrible two. But make sure the house dont catch fire while cooking!

Clean the livingroom and remove the mess from the living area.

The new generation will learn from whatever you will do and you can earn coins when you complete your task. Play with your dog in your house lawn and raise them by feeding the cat with cat food in the virtual game.

Your son is getting late! Drop him at the school bus and kiss him goodbye. Don’t forget to give him his lunch.

Dad Simulator Virtual Family Game Features:

- Interesting game play and multiple 3D levels.
- Efficient controls for the cleaning and housekeeping game.
- Adventures and fun filled tasks.
- Powerful controls for the animation performance.
- Realistic sounds and Graphics in the virtual game.
- Time based targets

How to Play:

- Start the game with the character selection
- Check the game target and perform the tasks of the game in every level.
- Complete the levels before the time runs out.
- Perform home, caring, cleaning and cooking tasks in the housekeeping game.
- Use the joystick to help the dad move around the house and perform tasks.
- Earn as much coins as you can after completing the level.
- Use animation button to perform the target task in the virtual game.
